duties_responsibilities.duty: Specify, provide and manage Safety support on specified projects in accordance with company policies and government regulations to control hazards to personnel and equipment.
Develop and implement programs to minimize risk to employees, customers, and the environment, ensuring compliance with EHS regulations.
Coordinate safety aspects of operations and engineering within the company, with customers, and other related organizations.
Report and present safety-related status and issues to EH&S team and business groups.
Evaluate and specify work methods, design requirements, procedures, and policies, ensuring regulatory compliance.
Facilitate job hazard assessments and qualitative exposure assessments for equipment and tools, ensuring safety requirements are considered and implemented.
Manage 3rd party Product Safety tool assessments and drive corrective actions within internal organizations.
Provide technical guidance on EHS/IH issues to the site manufacturing and engineering organizations, and contribute to the development of site-wide EH&S standards and procedures.

education_certification.credential: B.S. level degree or equivalent in Occupational Safety, Industrial Hygiene, or a related science/engineering discipline.
